extension.summary: Change your splash image @ Startup screen.
extension.description: This tool is meant to make it easier to either browse and select locally or via networked source, or download via a user provided url... an image to use to make a new Splash.png for use in XBMC / Kodi. This tool makes use of "special://home/media/Splash.png" so not to mess with the the Splash.png in the installed path's media folder. Inspiration for this addon came from seeing a random youtube video by XBMCONNECT while I was working on another project.
